rationale: Different components use varying loading indicators - some use Loader2 with amber color, others use custom border-based spinners with purple, and some have different sizes. This creates visual inconsistency.
problemSolved: CommunityGrid uses '<Loader2 className="w-8 h-8 animate-spin text-muted-foreground"/>'. UnifiedImageGallery uses '<div className="w-12 h-12 ... border-t-purple-500 rounded-full animate-spin"/>'. CreditsDisplay uses '<Loader2 className="w-8 h-8 animate-spin text-amber-500"/>'. No consistent size/color scheme.
